fields.name: osm_id
fields.description: OSM Id taken from the Id of this feature (node_id, way_id, or relation_id) in the OSM database.

fields.name: all_tags
fields.description: Unstructured key=value attributes for this object.

fields.name: layer_code
fields.description: Geofabrik layer code. Example: 1003. Layers are hierarchical; The mask code=10xx corresponds to 'place' layers, and code=1003 corresponds to a 'village' type of place.

fields.name: layer_class
fields.description: Geofabrik layer class, a friendly name for layer_code. Example: 'place'

fields.name: layer_name
fields.description: Geofabrik layer name, a friendly name for layer_code. Example: 'village'

fields.name: gdal_type
fields.description: OpenStreetMap feature type. One of: point, line, multilinestring, multipolygon, other_relation

fields.name: layer_partition
fields.description: Partitioning field for query optimization, see get_partitions(STRING) function
